name: Slider
description: A UI element that represents a horizontal slider for selecting numeric values (both int and float).

instanceFields.label: Label
instanceFields.description: The label text displayed next to the Slider.

instanceFields.label: Value
instanceFields.description: The current value of the Slider (returns int for integer sliders, float for float sliders).

instanceFields.label: LowValue
instanceFields.description: The minimum value of the Slider (returns int for integer sliders, float for float sliders).

instanceFields.label: HighValue
instanceFields.description: The maximum value of the Slider (returns int for integer sliders, float for float sliders).

instanceFields.label: PageSize
instanceFields.description: The page size for the slider. This is the amount by which the slider value changes when clicking in the slider track area. For integer sliders, this also controls the snapping/tick interval.

instanceFields.label: Direction
instanceFields.description: The direction of the slider (Horizontal or Vertical).

instanceFields.label: ShowInputField
instanceFields.description: If true, the slider will show a text field for direct input.

instanceFields.label: IsIntSlider
instanceFields.description: Returns true if this is an integer slider, false if it's a float slider.

instanceMethods.label: OnValueChanged
instanceMethods.description: Sets the method to be called when the Slider value changes.

parameters.name: valueChangedEvent
parameters.description: Method that will be called with the new value as parameter (int for integer sliders, float for float sliders)

instanceMethods.label: SetValueWithoutNotify
instanceMethods.description: Sets the value of the Slider without triggering any change events.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value to set (int for integer sliders, float for float sliders).
